original_text: Some other seeds fell among thorn bushes. Those bushes grew up with the young plants. They stopped the seeds from growing into strong plants.
korean_text: 더러는 가시떨기 위에 떨어지매 가시가 자라서 기운을 막았고

sentences.original_text: Some other seeds fell among thorn bushes.
Those bushes grew up with the young plants.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 가시덤불은 어린 식물들과 함께 자라났습니다.

sentences.original_text: They stopped the seeds from growing into strong plants.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 씨들이 튼튼한 식물로 자라는 것을 막았습니다.
